qas.question: What movie did Beyonce act in 2006?
Her second movie Beyonce did was what film?
The single, "Listen" was featured in which movie?
Beyonce's first world tour was when?
How much money did Beyonce's tour make in 2007?
How many millions of dollars did ''The Pink Panther'' gross world-wide?
What did Beyonce call her first concert tour?
Who was Beyonce's duet with in ''Beautiful Liar''?
Which film did Beyoncé star with Steve Martin in?
Beyoncé's role in Dreamgirls was based on what pop singer?
What was the lead single for the Dreamgirls soundtrack?
What was the name of Beyoncé's first international tour?
What pop singer did a duet with Beyoncé on Beautiful Liar?

context: Her first acting role of 2006 was in the comedy film <a0_0><a8_0>The Pink Panther<a8_0/><a0_0/> starring opposite Steve Martin, grossing $<a5_0>158.8 million<a5_0/> at the box office worldwide. Her second film <a1_0><a2_0>Dreamgirls<a2_0/><a1_0/>, the film version of the 1981 Broadway musical loosely based on The Supremes, received acclaim from critics and grossed $154 million internationally. In it, she starred opposite Jennifer Hudson, Jamie Foxx, and Eddie Murphy playing a pop singer based on <a9_0>Diana Ross.<a9_0/> To promote the film, Beyoncé released "<a10_0>Listen<a10_0/>" as the lead single from the soundtrack album. In April <a3_0>2007<a3_0/>, Beyoncé embarked on <a6_0><a11_0>The Beyoncé Experience<a11_0/><a6_0/>, her first worldwide concert tour, visiting 97 venues and grossed over $<a4_0>24 million<a4_0/>.[note 1] Beyoncé conducted pre-concert food donation drives during six major stops in conjunction with her pastor at St. John's and America's Second Harvest. At the same time, B'Day was re-released with five additional songs, including her duet with <a7_0><a12_0>Shakira<a12_0/><a7_0/> "Beautiful Liar".
